original_title: Sri Lanka to seek investors for BOT project in Trinco tank farm
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s cabinet has given approval to seek investors on build-operate-transfer project to rehabilitate nine tanks in the upper tank farm in Trincomalee, Minister Bandula Gunwardana said.
International and local investors can bid for the project, he said.
The tanks are part of Trinco Petroleum Terminal (Pvt) Ltd which has been leased 61 tanks for 50 years.
According to a feasibility study the tanks will be developed in stages.
The first stage is the nine tanks with the pipelines. (Colombo/Jan02/2023)
